home_page.about_us_text:
OptimaDecision Consulting (ODC) is a Moroccan company specialized in the optimization and improvement of the Supply Chain. We offer a full range of services: optimization and engineering of the supply chain, simulation of the various links in the Supply Chain, Lean Management methods, support for companies in obtaining various ISO certifications and the creation of Labels.
Our unique approach and commitment to providing high quality service will enable our clients to achieve exceptional results.

text.who_are_we:
OptimaDecision Consulting (ODC) is a Moroccan company specialized in the optimization and improvement of the Supply Chain. We offer a full range of services: optimization and engineering of the supply chain, simulation of the various links in the Supply Chain, Lean Management methods, support for companies in obtaining various ISO certifications and the creation of Labels.
              We also carry out Supply Chain audits for our clients in order to help them identify opportunities for improvement and to set up action plans to achieve their objectives as well as training in supply chain professions. Supply Chain.
              Our conviction is that the Supply Chain represents a key element of the strategy of any company for which effective and efficient management has a significant impact on its overall performance. Our expertise and know-how are made available to our customers to help them achieve optimal performance through the creation of decision support tools.
              Our unique approach and commitment to providing high quality service will enable our clients to achieve exceptional results.
text.formations: Discover our company, your preferred partner for your personal and professional development. Our extensive range of training includes tailor-made solutions, soft skills building programs, specialist training for doctoral students and even unique travel and learning experiences. Whether you want to strengthen your technical skills, improve your interpersonal communication, deepen your academic knowledge, or enjoy an immersive learning experience, we have everything you need. Our qualified and experienced trainers will guide you through your training journey, offering you relevant, interactive courses tailored to your specific needs. Invest in your professional growth with us and open yourself to a world of possibilities
